description: Laboratory exercise applying corrosion theory, testing methods, data analysis, and report submission on corrosion behavior of materials.
2-hour in-class test covering Weeks 1-5 topics with multiple-choice, numerical, and descriptive questions on corrosion concepts.
2-hour exam during the official exam period covering Weeks 5-10 topics, assessing application of concepts via descriptive questions.
Three short assignments (corrosion, wear, surface engineering) involving essays or questions with written/numerical answers to explore real-world applications.
